General.Name: Shenzhen Aoni Electronic Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Aoni Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of audio and video software and hardware products in China and internationally. It offers video conference cameras, smart network cameras, car cameras/driving recorders, TWS/noise reduction/AI headsets, and smart meeting cameras/speakers. The company also develops cloud computing, APP, embedded, production test, cloud technology development, AI intelligent algorithm, electronic circuit design, structural design, and test verification products. In addition, it provides manufacturing services for various brands. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen Aoni Electronic Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Aoxintong Innovation Investment Co., Ltd.
